mapper.insert: insert into clazz (name, room, begin_date, end_date, master_id, subject, create_time, update_time) values (#{name}, #{room}, #{beginDate}, #{endDate}, #{masterId}, #{subject}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: update clazz set name = #{name}, subject = #{subject}, room = #{room}, begin_date = #{beginDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, master_id = #{masterId} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select c.id, c.name, room, begin_date beginDate, end_date endDate, master_id masterId, subject, c.create_time createTime, c.update_time updateTime, e.name masterName from clazz c left join emp e on c.master_id = e.id where c.id = #{id}
